title: The best games Alawar (April 2014)
description:
Name: The best games Alawar (April 2014)
Edition type: pirate
Genre: business, search of subjects, shooter games, begalka, a quest, an arcade, puzzles, for children, the balls, three in a row
Developer: Youda Games, Playcamedy, Itera Laboratories & Game House, Big Fish Games & Elephant Games/Alawar Entertainment
Year: 2014
Platform: PC

Interface language: Russian
Tablet: Is present (crack)

System requirements: 
Operating system: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
Processor: 1Ghz,
Random access memory: 512 Mb RAM,
Videocard: 64 Mb VRAM,
Additional ON: DirectX 9.0

Instruction on installation

1 . To establish the pleasant games by the corresponding.exe files
2  .  We start the established game through a label on a desktop. 
3 . After the expiration of the trial period, we start the AlawarCrack.exe file. In the opened window we press the PATCH/PATCH and we specify a way to the executed file (.exe expansion) of game and we press the Open button. It is necessary to specify the file of start of game (without.wrp in the name)
3 . Under the activator there is the window informing us on success of operation. We press on the notice "OK", and on the activator the EXIT.
4 . We start game from a label on a desktop. Pleasant game!

P.S. At the menu of the Activator there is video the instruction



Description: Full collection of the games Alawar for April, 2014
